Name: Childhood Dreams - Jigsaw Puzzle
About the game: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces. - 3 difficulty settings: Up to 42 pieces! - 16 puzzles - Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time! - 1080p HD Graphics. - Traditional jigsaw puzzle that you can easily play - More puzzles will increase with DLC
